queued.title: [Advanced]: Security: Refactor Node Termination Handler IAM permissions
queued.brief: The Node Termination Handler (NTH) currently uses `AmazonSQSFullAccess`, violating least privilege. This issue proposes refactoring NTH IAM permissions to a tightly scoped policy allowing only necessary SQS actions on a dedicated, explicitly provisioned SQS queue for NTH events, routed via EventBridge. This enhances security by minimizing the blast radius of a compromised NTH pod.
